sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Campus Security Enhancement Act of 2008.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Campus Security Enhancement Act of 2008.

sections.heading: Background investigation.
sections.text:
Each public institution of higher
education shall, through written policy and procedures, identify
security-sensitive positions and make provision for the completion of criminal
background investigations prior to employing individuals in those positions.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
